name: documentation-check
description: Ensures code changes include documentation updates
prompt:
When committing code changes, check for documentation:

```
üìù DOCUMENTATION CHECK

Files changed:
[List of code files]

Documentation check:
[ ] Public API changes documented?
[ ] README updated if needed?
[ ] JSDoc/docstrings added?
[ ] CHANGELOG entry created?

New public functions without docs:
[List functions missing documentation]

Recommendations:
1. Add inline documentation
2. Update README for new features
3. Add CHANGELOG entry
4. Update API docs

Proceed without docs? (yes/no)
```
